name: Truck it 3D
description:
It’s time to take to the open road, in Truck it 3D!

These deliveries need dropping off pronto, and it’s up to you to haul it over! Follow the directions to your destination, steering to avoid the other lunatics on the road. Make sure the trailer stays attached to the cab, things can get messy when trailers start flying!

With a variety of designs to choose from, you can make your truck match your personality and stand out as the king of the road!

Are you ready for the challenge?

Truck it 3D features:
-Unlock a variety of accessories for your truck!
-A variety of fun characters to play as!
-Drive trucks across the country!
-Avoid other road users
-The latest exciting simulator from Kwalee!
